original_name: Buzz Aldrin, hvor ble det av deg i alt mylderet?
plot: A man which is almost obsessed by being anonymous, and never the best in anything. Being second means that you are not noticed, forgotten, but still important as a human.
plot_en: A man which is almost obsessed by being anonymous, and never the best in anything. Being second means that you are not noticed, forgotten, but still important as a human.
plot_es: A man which is almost obsessed by being anonymous, and never the best in anything. Being second means that you are not noticed, forgotten, but still important as a human.
title: Buzz Aldrin, hvor ble det av deg i alt mylderet?
